New Records: Arshdeep Singh's best figures in a T20I: 4/9
Key Match Events: India won by 7 wickets with 10 balls remaining
Suryakumar Yadav scored a run-a-ball half-century
India awarded five penalty runs due to USA's delay in starting overs
Ali Khan cleaned up Rishabh Pant
Saurabh Netravalkar dismissed Virat Kohli for a golden duck
Arshdeep Singh struck off the very first delivery
Hardik Pandya bowled a wicket-maiden in the 17th over
Mohammed Siraj took a blinder at deep square leg to dismiss Nitish Kumar
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma opted to bowl first after winning the toss
USA made two changes: Shayan Jahangir and Shadley van Schalkwyk came in for Monank Patel and Noshthush Kenjige
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch had appreciable seam movement
The match was played at Nassau County Stadium in New York
The game had a significant atmosphere with a full house of mostly desis
